name: Space Escape (Werdna821)
description:
This is my modified 3D FPS Shooter Project for CAS 117 at MSU

The following things have been modified

1. Created level 3. All new terrain, enemies, and size of level.

2. Created a level 4. Second boss fight

3. New music for each level, main menu music the same.

4. Made changes to the enemies movements on level 3 (Wasn't working 100% still)

5. Enemies drop items more frequently. And have more health

6. Added a controls button on main menu and finished the about tab as seen in the pictures. Also added the new level select buttons. All the buttons are evenly spaced out to look nice and presentable.

7. The new game name is Space Escape.

Credits:

Created by Andrew Jamison

Michigan State university

https://freesound.org
